q1: Do you think Real Madrid will win the next Champions League?
a1: I think they have a fighting chance but I can't know for sure.
q2: Is Real Madrid better than Barcelona?
a2: Real Madrid is sometimes better than Barcelona.
q3: Real Madrid is way better than Barcelona.
a3: Real Madrid has often been better than Barcelona, but there are always new players coming up that could change that.
a4: Ronaldo, Bale, and Benzema are the best scoreres.
q5: Didn’t Ronaldo just leave the team?
a5: Cristiano Ronaldo is playing in Juventus
